definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: For securities firms to fulfill settlement obligations on securities trading markets.
sentences.chinese: 供證券商爲履行證券交易市場之交割義務。

sentences.english: Associated persons of securities firms that have been registered and approved by this Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 二經本公司登記准予進入市場之證券商業務人員。

sentences.english: Core Pacific is one of the Participants who are ready for dealing in RMB securities.
sentences.chinese: 京華山一已成爲合資格人民幣證券交易證券商之一。

sentences.english: Sale of Securities Dealers commissioned by the Acting stock.
sentences.chinese: 委託證券商代庖買賣股票。

sentences.english: Upon occurrence of default by a securities firm, the GTSM may temporarily suspend its participation in EBTS trading.
sentences.chinese: 證券商違約時，本中心得暫停其參加本系統之買賣。

sentences.english: Disposing of the bonds obtained by the securities firm in the original purchase.
sentences.chinese: 先洽其他證券商承作附條件買賣，再依前款規定處理。

sentences.english: Securities firms shall establish a clear authorization standard for all types of transactions .
sentences.chinese: 證券商應針對各種型態之交易，設立明確的授權標準。

sentences.english: For securities firms and customers to redeliver securities borrowed or to compensate for securities entitlements.
sentences.chinese: 供證券商及客戶返還借券或證券權益補償。

definition: to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
